name: ATV Offroad Fury: Blazin' Trails
overview: Blazin' Trails is a take on its console counterparts, with 24 ATVs that can be used during the game as well as the standard game modes: Practice, Lap Attack, Single Race, Championship Mode, Free Riding Mode and a Multiplayer mode where players can face each other head-to-head using Ad Hoc. Players can also tune their ATVs by changing tires and gear ratios as well as customizing them and their rider as well. It also features a trading card system, where players can unlock new ATVs as well as new racing gear that players can trade with each other through Ad Hoc and a Garage Mode where players can keep track of their career stats. With over 34 freestyle tricks that can be performed their are also six different terrains that can be raced on including snow, dirt, ice, mud, water and even the plain ole grassy field.
